fields.name: AdminUsername
fields.description: The name of the administrator to which the ssh public keys will be added into the authorized keys.

fields.name: AvailabilityZone
fields.description: The cluster availability zone containing this virtual machine.

fields.name: BareMetalMachineId
fields.description: The resource ID of the bare metal machine the virtual machine has landed to.

fields.name: BootMethod
fields.description: Selects the boot method for the virtual machine.

fields.name: CloudServicesNetworkAttachment
fields.description: The cloud service network that provides platform-level services for the virtual machine.

fields.name: ClusterId
fields.description: The resource ID of the cluster the virtual machine is created for.

fields.name: CpuCores
fields.description: The number of CPU cores in the virtual machine.

fields.name: DetailedStatus
fields.description: The more detailed status of the virtual machine.

fields.name: DetailedStatusMessage
fields.description: The descriptive message about the current detailed status.

fields.name: IsolateEmulatorThread
fields.description: Field Deprecated, the value will be ignored if provided. The indicator of whether one of the specified CPU cores is isolated to run the emulator thread for this virtual machine.

fields.name: MemorySizeGB
fields.description: The memory size of the virtual machine in GB.

fields.name: NetworkAttachments
fields.description: The list of network attachments to the virtual machine.

fields.name: NetworkData
fields.description: The Base64 encoded cloud-init network data.

fields.name: PlacementHints
fields.description: The scheduling hints for the virtual machine.

fields.name: PowerState
fields.description: The power state of the virtual machine.

fields.name: ProvisioningState
fields.description: The provisioning state of the virtual machine.

fields.name: SshPublicKeys
fields.description: The list of ssh public keys. Each key will be added to the virtual machine using the cloud-init ssh_authorized_keys mechanism for the adminUsername.

fields.name: StorageProfile
fields.description: The storage profile that specifies size and other parameters about the disks related to the virtual machine.

fields.name: UserData
fields.description: The Base64 encoded cloud-init user data.

fields.name: VMDeviceModel
fields.description: The type of the device model to use.

fields.name: VMImageRepositoryCredentials
fields.description: The credentials used to login to the image repository that has access to the specified image.

fields.name: VirtioInterface
fields.description: Field Deprecated, use virtualizationModel instead. The type of the virtio interface.

fields.name: VmImage
fields.description: The virtual machine image that is currently provisioned to the OS disk, using the full url and tag notation used to pull the image.

fields.name: Volumes
fields.description: The resource IDs of volumes that are attached to the virtual machine.
